mapper.select: SELECT locked, user_id, user_name, organization_id, duties_id, state, entry_time, dimission_time, omni, source, technical_title, record, main_buildings, chief_id, connecttion_way, password, working_time, closing_time, user_persion, user_house_pre FROM user_duties WHERE user_name=#{userName}

SELECT locked, user_id, user_name, organization_id, duties_id, state, entry_time, dimission_time, omni, source, technical_title, record, main_buildings, chief_id, connecttion_way, password, working_time, closing_time, user_persion, user_house_pre FROM user_duties WHERE organization_id=( SELECT organization_id FROM organization_structure WHERE organization_name=#{organizationName} )

SELECT locked, user_id, user_name, organization_id, duties_id, state, entry_time, dimission_time, omni, source, technical_title, record, main_buildings, chief_id, connecttion_way, password, working_time, closing_time, user_persion, user_house_pre FROM user_duties WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT locked, user_id, user_name, organization_id, duties_id, state, entry_time, dimission_time, omni, source, technical_title, record, main_buildings, chief_id, connecttion_way, password, working_time, closing_time, user_persion, user_house_pre FROM user_duties
mapper.insert: insert into user_duties (locked, user_id, user_name, organization_id, duties_id, state, entry_time, dimission_time, omni, source, technical_title, record, main_buildings, chief_id, connecttion_way, password, working_time, closing_time, user_persion, user_house_pre) values (#{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutiesId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dimissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{omni,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicalTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainBuildings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chiefId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{connecttionWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workingTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{closingTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{userPersion,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{userHousePre,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user_duties
locked,
user_id,
user_name,
organization_id,
duties_id,
state,
entry_time,
dimission_time,
omni,
source,
technical_title,
record,
main_buildings,
chief_id,
connecttion_way,
password,
working_time,
closing_time,
user_persion,
user_house_pre,
